original_text: I will make this city a heap of stones. People will see how disgusting my people are. Everybody who goes near there will be very surprised. They will see all the terrible trouble that has happened to the city and they will insult it.
korean_text: 이 성읍으로 놀람과 조롱 거리가 되게 하리니 그 모든 재앙으로 말미암아 지나는 자마다 놀라며 조롱할 것이며

sentences.original_text: I will make this city a heap of stones
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이 성을 돌 무더기로 만들겠다

sentences.original_text: People will see how disgusting my people are
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 내 백성이 얼마나 역겨운지 볼 것이다

sentences.original_text: Everybody who goes near there will be very surprised
sentences.korean_translation: 그 근처를 지나가는 모든 사람이 크게 놀랄 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will see all the terrible trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 모든 끔찍한 재앙을 볼 것이다

sentences.original_text: that has happened to the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그 성에 일어난 재앙을 볼 것이다
